entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
